titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Robert and Wilma Jones home movies 1952-1978
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tawnya Mosier.

publicationstmt.publisher: Multimedia Archives, J. Willard Marriott Library, University of Utah

repository.corpname: University of Utah Libraries, Special Collections

did.unittitle: Robert and Wilma Jones home movies

physdesc.extent: 186 8mm films with Betacam and VHS videocassette. All film reels are 25 ft long.

did.abstract: The Robert and Wilma Jones home movies (1952-1978) document the Jones family's birthdays, holidays, vacations and daily life at their home in Vernal, Utah. This collection is one of the most complete home movie collections held by the Multimedia Archives and gives enormous insight into the everyday life of Utahns from the 1950s through the 1970s.

scopecontent.p: The Robert and Wilma Jones home movies (1952-1978) consist of 8mm films documenting the Jones family's birthdays, holidays, vacations and daily life at their home in Vernal, Utah. This collection is one of the most complete home movie collections held by the Multimedia Archives and gives enormous insight into the everyday life of Utahns from the 1950s through the 1970s.

arrangement.p: The materials are arraned chronologically, except where noted.

accessrestrict.p: Materials must be used on-site; no use of original material, access copies will be made available for viewing. Five business days advanced notice required. Access to parts of this collection may be restricted under provisions of state or federal law, condition of the material, or by donor.

scopecontent.p: VHS and Betacam copies of all films in this collection are available for use.
